action: Hi buddy , How are you?
How can i help you?
hi,i'm here to help you
Hey! How are you?

text: When did I submit the resume (Date?)
When did I submit the resume date

action: Sitanshu sinha (Name of recruiter)

text: Where did you get my resume
action: Job portal(Dice,Monster,Linkedin)

text: What is the timing for interview
action: Walkin Drive will be accepting registrations between 9 AM EST to 3 PM EST

text: Whom should I Contact once reach the venue location?
action: Once you reach the venue, you can call Prithveesh at 513.485.7383 for any further direction

text: What is the exact Skill you are looking for?
action: Someone who is having some basic understanding of Java OR .Net technology. Any prior experience of working on a project or working for an organization on related technologies will be good to have.

text: I want to talk to a Human
action: We tried our best to help but it seems you have a query on which unfortnately we still don’t have an answer. We will let the team know to reach you out w/ an answer. Alternately, in case of urgency pls reach out to Ms. Anitha - email id, Contact number

text: What is the address of interview
where should i come for interview
where should i present for interview
action: Tata Consultancy Services , 379 Thornall Street - 4th Floor Edison, New Jersey - 08837, United States

text: What is the full name of TCS
What is the interview company Name
action: Tata consultancy services
Walkin Drive will be accepting registrations between 9 AM EST to 3 PM EST

text: Do I have to be there all day from 9-3
Do I have to be there for whole day
I can't spend whole day over there
action: No you have to come between 9:00 to 3:00 at ANYTIME

text: May I know the company profile
Tell me about Tata consultancy services
action: Tata Consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organisation.TCS has over 400,000+ of the world’s best-trained consultants in over 46 countries across the globe. For more detail, you may want to visit our website: www.tcs.com or TCS Career website: www.careers.tcs.com

text: Can you send the calendar invite for the interview
action: Yes,With details like exact venue location,Timing of interview,SPOC contact details

text: Do I have a face-to-face interview
i can't appear for face to face interview
Is there a face to face interview
can i have a phone interview
how to avoid face to face interview
I was never informed about face to face interview
not informed about face to face interview
action: We would like to appologise for missing out this information earlier but In-person interview is mandatory for this job. Do let us know in case you would want to re-schedule this interview. We can get back to you in case any other walk-in drive will be planned in your city

text: I have low GPA - am I still eligible
if the GPA is below 3.0, still I am eligible
action: A GPA of at least 3.0 is a mandatory crietria. Below that GPA will not be acceptable

text: can i have a phone interview
action: This is a walk-In Drive and we do not have the option of conducting telephonic/ Skype interviews. In-person interview is mandatory

text: Should I come in formal or casual
action: The dress code for the interview is business formals

text: I have already went for other location drive and rejected, still am I eligible to go for this drive
Do you consider candidates that have failed one interview in past
action: Yes. We can interview you again to see if any improvements in your knowledge and skills.

text: I already got selected in one location, But other location is preferable, can I attend the interview in that location or can you consider my selection for my preferable location
action: Sorry, this would not be possible

text: I don’t have the skill set that you are asking, am I eligible to apply for this position
action: Sorry for the inconvienence. We will not be able to consider since your skill/experience does not match the required skills or Knowledge.

text: Is this the Full time position or contract
action: No this is 100% on site role
This is full time/Permanent role with TCS.

text: May I know the benefits breakouts
is there any bond for years
Can you send me the salary confirmation
action: TCS offers one of the best in the industry. Salary and benefits can be discussed in detail during the HR Discussion rounds

text: What is the exact Skill you are looking for
what is my position in tcs
action: Someone who is having some basic understanding of Java OR .Net technology. Any prior experience of working on a project or working for an organization on related technologies will be good to have

text: Can TCS provide the travel expenses
Can TCS provide the food expenses
action: Sorry that you should manage by yourself

text: How long will be the training period
action: Around 6 Weeks post joining not more then that

text: Will the training session be in the same location
same location as base location after training
action: Highly the training location and your baselocation is same, but TCS reserves the right to change the Training location basis the need.

text: Will TCS provide the Accommodation for training period
will you provide stay during training
action: No, TCS does not provide accomodation and candidates are expected to take care of the same by themselves

text: I have not completed my College yet can I still apply
i'm a student now can i apply
action: Student can also apply for this drive but you should a final year student as we cannot hold your offer for more then a year

text: I have only my associate degree is that fine
action: For this graduate hiring drive, we are accepting only Graduate or Masters degree holding candidates

text: I’m not available on that day, Can you schedule for some other day
action: Sure, will notify the team about your inability to come for an interview in this drive. We shall get back to you in case any other walk-in drive will be planned in your city
